list.description: Refresh interval for Ping-Admin Exporter (configured as env variable for application)
list.label: Refresh Interval
list.name: refresh_interval_seconds

list.description:
Predefined actual data minutes.

It calculates from ENV variables:
1) configured exporter refresh interval (in seconds);
2) number of staleness steps (max allowed steps for actual data).

For example, if exporter runs every 180 seconds and allowable delay is 3 exporter runs (steps) then variable value is 9 minutes.
list.name: max_actual_minutes
